DOC.brief_title: Preventing Sexual Aggression Among High School Boys
DOC.detailed_description: The present research advance science sexual assault prevention create mutually beneficial partnership well-established sexual assault prevention researcher CDC Rape Prevention Education Program ( RPE ) -funded community agency conduct rigorous experimental evaluation universal primary prevention programming design reduce sexual aggression among high school boy . The present research test multi-session prevention program target change multiple level social ecology ( i.e. , individual- , peer- community-level ) social norm theory bystander education . Specifically , present research evaluate Your Voice Your View . Your Voice Your View develop currently administer Rhode Island High Schools CDC RPE-funded agency Day One Rhode Island . The program test group randomize cluster trial among 10th grader 30 high school , aim reduce perpetration sexual aggression among high school boy . Specifically , research conduct randomize control trial sample 10th grade student demonstrate efficacy intervention reduce rate sexual aggression among high school boy , rate date violence involvement , relate risk protective factor 2- 6-month follow-up comparison wait-list control group . Thirty school match demographic characteristic ( i.e. , % receive subsidized lunch , racial/ethnic minority enrollment ) randomize receive Your Voice Your View wait-list control group .
